name: Haunted Heist (WilllRU)
description:
A short Rogue-like demo that was made in 48 hours by 4 people.

It's a simple horror game where a young trick-or-treater stumbles upon a rundown mansion for sake of collecting some candy!

Entering the mansion, he decides to collect some candy and doesn't plan to leave until he has at least a handful. However, as he would least suspect it, he will run into some trouble along the way.
